amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 33 in the Congressional Record of July 22, 1996, to increase funding for the EEOC by $13 million and to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for prison construction by an equal amount.

action.text: Norton amendment (A033) modified by unanimous consent. Modification to increase EEOC funding by $7 million and to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Small Business Administration for administrative expenses of disaster loan assistance.
On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A033) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
